dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Lessons About Scale Join this panel as they present findings and lessons learned across the spectrum of an SMS reminder and incentive program for immunization services from development to evaluation to scale Presentations will be ordered along the continuum of a scaled program to take you on a journey from concept and development to pilot phase to an randomized controlled trial to a scaled program with presenters focusing on then roadblocks results and lessons learned specific to their section Presented by Alain B Labrique PhD MHS MSDirector JHU Global mHealth InitiativeAssociate ProfessorDept of International Health Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T11:16:09Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 ecosystems_ghdf.pptx: 8728976 bytes, checksum: 73cd3d5e978c553c67044e291877e228 (MD5)
Pathways to Scale: Ecosystem "Fertility" is a Rate- Limiting Factor
